styles.styleDescription: A balanced fighting style based on historical German longsword techniques, featuring tactical stance-switching and powerful strikes.

cards.name: Vom Tag
cards.subtitle: From the Roof
cards.effect: Enter the Vom Tag stance. While in this stance, your attacks deal +1 damage.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, also draw 1 card when you deal damage.
cards.flavorText: The high guard - sword raised above the head, poised to strike with power.

cards.name: Alber
cards.subtitle: Fool's Guard
cards.effect: Enter the Alber stance. While in this stance, reduce damage from attacks by 1.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, also force your opponent to spend +1 energy for their next attack.
cards.flavorText: A deceptively vulnerable-looking low guard that invites attack while preparing the perfect counter.

cards.name: Ochs
cards.subtitle: Ox Guard
cards.effect: Enter the Ochs stance. While in this stance, when attacked, you may change to a different stance immediately after damage is resolved.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, reduce the next attack's damage by 2 instead of changing stance.
cards.flavorText: The weapon held at head height, pointed forward like an ox's horns, ready to redirect incoming threats.

cards.name: Zwerchhau
cards.subtitle: Thwart Strike
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage. If you're in an Aggressive stance, this attack cannot be reduced by defensive effects.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, also force opponent to exit their current stance.
cards.flavorText: A horizontal strike that comes in from an unexpected angle, breaking through guards.

cards.name: Krumphau
cards.subtitle: Crooked Strike
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage. If you're in a Defensive stance, draw 1 card.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, deal 3 damage instead.
cards.flavorText: A curved strike aimed at the opponent's hands or forearms, parrying and attacking in one motion.

cards.name: Schielhau
cards.subtitle: Squinting Strike
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage. If you're in an Evasive stance, change to an Aggressive stance after this attack resolves.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, this attack deals +2 damage if you change stance.
cards.flavorText: A downward diagonal cut delivered with the 'false' edge, using deception and unexpected angles.

cards.name: Nachreisen
cards.subtitle: Following After
cards.effect: Play when your opponent changes stance. Deal 1 damage and draw 1 card.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, also enter any stance of your choice without paying its cost.
cards.flavorText: The art of exploiting the moment when an opponent transitions, catching them in movement.

cards.name: Winden
cards.subtitle: Winding
cards.effect: If you're in a stance, you may change to any other stance. Then deal 1 damage.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Longsword cards this turn, negate the next stance advantage your opponent would gain against you this turn.
cards.flavorText: A flowing technique of binding the opponent's blade while transitioning between positions with control.

styles.styleDescription: An offense-focused fighting style based on historical Viking and medieval axe techniques, featuring momentum building and powerful cleaving attacks.

cards.name: Høggva
cards.subtitle: Cleaving Stance
cards.effect: Enter the Høggva stance. While in this stance, gain +1 Momentum when you deal damage.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, immediately gain 2 Momentum upon entering this stance.
cards.flavorText: The axe held high, body coiled like a spring ready to unleash devastating force.

cards.name: Skjaldborg
cards.subtitle: Shield Wall
cards.effect: Enter the Skjaldborg stance. While in this stance, when attacked, you may spend 2 Momentum to reduce damage by 2.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, reduce damage by 3 instead.
cards.flavorText: Axes were not just weapons of aggression - the head could hook and the haft could block.

cards.name: Sviða
cards.subtitle: Sweeping Guard
cards.effect: Enter the Sviða stance. While in this stance, if an opponent's attack misses or is fully blocked, gain 1 Momentum.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, you may immediately spend Momentum to deal that much damage to your opponent.
cards.flavorText: A low, wide stance with the axe ready to sweep across, creating space while preparing to counter.

cards.name: Brotna
cards.subtitle: Sunder Strike
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage. You may spend up to 3 Momentum to add that much additional damage.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, this attack also forces your opponent to discard a Focus card.
cards.flavorText: A devastating overhead strike designed to break through any defense, splintering wood and metal alike.

cards.name: Krækja
cards.subtitle: Hook Pull
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage and pull your opponent into your stance advantage (if any). Gain 1 Momentum.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, also force opponent to exit their current stance.
cards.flavorText: Using the axe's head to hook behind a shield or limb, yanking the opponent off-balance.

cards.name: Tvíhenda
cards.subtitle: Double-Handed Swing
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage. If you have 4+ Momentum, this attack cannot be reduced by defensive effects.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, gain Momentum equal to the damage dealt.
cards.flavorText: A powerful two-handed swing that builds upon previous momentum, unstoppable once in motion.

cards.name: Kasta
cards.subtitle: Throwing Axe
cards.effect: Play when your opponent plays an attack. Deal 2 damage and spend all Momentum. For each Momentum spent, deal +1 damage.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, draw a card after this attack resolves.
cards.flavorText: A desperate but effective counter - hurling a smaller axe to interrupt an incoming attack.

cards.name: Bylgjur
cards.subtitle: Waves of Force
cards.effect: Gain 2 Momentum. Your next Battle Axe attack costs 1 less to play this turn.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Battle Axe cards this turn, also draw a card for every 3 Momentum you have.
cards.flavorText: A series of rhythmic feints that build power like ocean waves before crashing down upon the enemy.

styles.styleDescription: A fluid fighting style based on redirection and adaptability, featuring reactive abilities and flow mechanics that turn opponents' actions to your advantage.

cards.name: Tidal Form
cards.subtitle: Rising and Falling
cards.effect: Enter the Tidal Form stance. While in this stance, whenever you're attacked, gain 1 Flow.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, immediately gain 2 Flow upon entering this stance.
cards.flavorText: The water rises to meet force, absorbing and collecting energy rather than opposing it directly.

cards.name: Whirlpool Form
cards.subtitle: Circular Motion
cards.effect: Enter the Whirlpool Form stance. While in this stance, you may spend 2 Flow to change to any other stance as a reaction to an attack.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, also deal 2 damage when you change stance this way.
cards.flavorText: The spinning current creates both escape and opportunity, drawing opponents into its spiraling trap.

cards.name: Crashing Wave
cards.subtitle: Overwhelming Force
cards.effect: Enter the Crashing Wave stance. While in this stance, you may spend Flow to add that much damage to your attacks.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, your next attack costs 1 less energy to play.
cards.flavorText: The gentle ocean becomes a tsunami when its accumulated power finds direction and purpose.

cards.name: Redirect Current
cards.subtitle: Path of Least Resistance
cards.effect: Play when attacked. Reduce damage by 1 and gain Flow equal to the remaining damage taken.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, also change to any stance of your choice.
cards.flavorText: Water never truly stops an attack - it yields momentarily, only to return with gathered momentum.

cards.name: Drowning Pressure
cards.subtitle: Overwhelming Depths
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage. Your opponent must spend 2 energy on their next turn or take 2 additional damage.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, gain Flow equal to damage dealt.
cards.flavorText: The crushing weight of deep water creates an inescapable dilemma - struggle and exhaust yourself, or accept the inevitable.

cards.name: Eroding Stream
cards.subtitle: Persistent Pressure
cards.effect: Deal 1 damage. If you have 3+ Flow, your opponent must discard a Focus card of your choice.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, also draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Even the hardest stone eventually yields to the patient, persistent touch of flowing water.

cards.name: Mist Veil
cards.subtitle: Obscuring Presence
cards.effect: Gain 3 Flow. The next time you would take damage this turn, reduce that damage by 2.
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, your opponent cannot target you with attacks of 3 or more damage until your next turn.
cards.flavorText: The water disperses into countless droplets, making it impossible to strike with precision or power.

cards.name: Flowing Reversal
cards.subtitle: Adaptive Response
cards.effect: Spend any amount of Flow. Draw cards equal to half the Flow spent (rounded up).
cards.masterEffect: If you've played 2+ Water Magic cards this turn, the next card you play costs 2 less energy.
cards.flavorText: The watercourse changes direction instantly when meeting an obstacle, finding a new path forward in response to circumstance.
